entry.title: 50 Gram [400 Packs] "Dry & Dry" SPECIAL Food Safe Orange Indicating(Orange to Dark Green) Mixed Silica Gel Packets - Rechargeable(FDA Compliant)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dry & Dry
Type: Aiwa Paper(Food Safe)
Price: 179.99

  • 100 % SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - 100% Refund or New Replacement BEYOND REFUND PERIOD if you are not happy with our product.(See Our Customers' Reviews)
  • 30+ YEAR EXPERIENCE in the Industry of Silica Gel Desiccant - Premium Quality Pure and Safe Silica Gel without Cobalt Chloride. NO RISK
  • CONTAINS MIXTURE OF WHITE SILICA GEL BEADS WITH FEW ORANGE INDICATING BEADS - Easy to Read Orange(Dry) to Dark Green(Saturated)
  • PACKET MATERIAL SPECIALLY MANUFACTURED FROM JAPAN - This Special Packet is the ONLY PACKET IN THE CURRENT SILICA GEL INDUSTRY  that is food safe, indicating, and rechargeable via both oven and microwave.
  • Note: 400 Packets are stored in box(Bulk Packaging).

DRY & DRY - OUR PRODUCTS 
• 30+ Years Experience in the Industry for Silica Gel Desiccant - See Our Customers' Reviews. 
• Dry & Dry Silica Gel is a Pure, Vitreous, Porous Form of Silicon Dioxide made from Sodium Silicate. 
• It is Purified and Processed into either Granular or Beaded Form. 
• Its High Absorption Capacity is Attributed to its Millions of Tiny Pores. 
• The Mechanism of Absorption is Purely Physical, with No Change in Size or Shape of the Particles even as They become Saturated.  
• Even When fully Saturated, the Material still Looks and Feels Dry. 
Clever Storage 
• Foods, Medications, Vitamins, Seeds, Nuts, Beef Jerkey, Snacks, Cookies, Spices, & Pet Foods. 
Clever Protection 
• Guns, Ammo, Canister, Collectables, Jewelry, Documents, Camera Lens, Clothes, Cosmetics, Books, Travel & Gym Bags, Decorations, & Valuables 
Clever Saver 
• Wet Cell Phone, Camera, Watches, Electronics, Shoes, & Windshield. 

DRY & DRY - PREMIUM QUALITY 
• 30+ Years Experience in the Industry for Silica Gel Desiccant - Premium Quality. 
• Our Silica Gel Packaging is the Highest Quality in the Industry for Moisture Absorption. 
• Even Our Packet Material was Tested under Strict Regulation for Food & Medication. 
• You can Experience a Big Difference Compared to Other Products. 
• Products of Dry&Dry Guarantee 100% Satisfaction. NO RISK 
• We REALLY want Our Customers to be HAPPY with Our Products. If You are not Happy, We are not Happy. Please Contact us. We will give You Free Replacement or Full Refund Even BEYOND REFUND PERIOD.

entry.title: 50 gram X 20 PK "Dry & Dry" Premium Silica Gel Packs - 4 Humidity Indicator Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dry @ Dry
Type: Desiccant, Moisture Absorber
Price: 18.99

30 Year Experience in the Industry for Silica Gel Desiccant - Premium Quality(See Our Customers' Reviews)

You are now bidding on 20 Packets of Brand new Fresh 50 gram Silica Gel and 4 Premium Humidity Cards

 

    • Packet dimension : 4" x  4"
    • Silica Gel Beads Size : about 1 ~ 3 mm
    • Silica Gel Beads Color : Clear White
    • Pure Silica Gel without Cobalt Chloride
    • Packet Material is Special Fabric by Spunbond Technology for "Ultimate Moisture Absorption" and "Heat Resistance for Reuse".
    • Packets are stored in RESEALABLE Self-Standing High Quality Bag for Easy Storage and Use - Newly Designed Air Tight Sealing & Sturdy Bag for Moisture Control.
    • Packets can be Reactivated by Heating in an Oven for 0.5-2.0 hours at 200-250 F Or Microwave for 10 Minutes at DEFROST. - Packets are stored in Resealable Self-Standing High Quality Bag for Easy Storage and Use(Air Tight Sealing & Sturdy Bag for Moisture Control).
    • We REALLY Want Our Customers to be HAPPY with Our Products. If You are not Happy, We are not Happy. Please contact us. We will Give You Free Replacement or Full Refund Even BEYOND REFUND PERIOD.
    • (4 Pack) Premium Humidity Indicator Cards(REUSABLE More than 20 Times) - Do not have in Direct Contact with Foods or Medications to be Consumed.
    • When you initially open the card, all dots sometimes react and change color because they are exposed to sudden humidity. If you wait for about 30 minutes, the card will calibrate and you will be able to read the humidity level. If 10% dot is pink and 30% dot is blue, and 20% dot is lavender, then the humidity level is about 15%. If the 30% dot is pink, it is time to change the desiccant. The humidity card itself is reusable. When the humidity level is low, the dots will change from pink to blue again. With long use, the color of the dots may faint. Then, you can replace the card. 

 

  • GOOD FOR GUN RIFLE JEWELRY CAMERA LENS SAFE MOISTURE PROTECTION

 

Free Shipping

 
   


   Payment


We accept only Paypal and we accept all major credit cards through PayPal checkout. 

Sorry, no personal checks and/or other payment methods. Buyers must claim and pay for their items within 7 days of auction close. 
   Shipping


FAST SHIPPING USING USPS FIRST CLASS MAIL WITHIN 24 HOUR OF PAYMENT 

We ship to all 50 U.S states and APO/FPO addresses. 

No international shipping 

All shipping options include delivery confirmation. 

Only ship to Paypal address (No exception). Please confirm before check out. 
We are always happy to combine shipping. Please request an Invoice before making payment..

*Term of Conditions: Buyer will be responsible for the shipping charge and tax (if applicable). 
   Tax


California Residents add 8.00% sales tax. 
   Return


Defective items will be fully refunded or exchanged with new one. (no shipping or insurance refund) 

If you don't want the item anymore, You have 7 days from receipt to inform us of the return and 5 days to ship it back to us. No restocking fee! (Non Defective items: must be new never used and in original condition)

Type: Desiccant, Moisture Absorber
Price: 39.99

You are now bidding on 50 Packets of Brand new Fresh 50 gram Silica Gel.

 

 

  • Packet dimension : 4" x  4"
  • Silica Gel Beads Size : about 1 ~ 3 mm
  • Silica Gel Beads Color : Clear White
  • Pure Silica Gel without Cobalt Chloride
  • Packet Material is Special Fabric by Spunbond Technology for "Ultimate Moisture Absorption" and "Heat Resistance for Reuse".
  • Packets are stored in RESEALABLE Self-Standing High Quality Bag for Easy Storage and Use - Newly Designed Air Tight Sealing & Sturdy Bag for Moisture Control.
  • Packets can be Reactivated by Heating in an Oven for 0.5-2.0 hours at 200-250 F Or Microwave for 10 Minutes at DEFROST. - Packets are stored in Resealable Self-Standing High Quality Bag for Easy Storage and Use(Air Tight Sealing & Sturdy Bag for Moisture Control).
  • We REALLY Want Our Customers to be HAPPY with Our Products. If You are not Happy, We are not Happy. Please contact us. We will Give You Free Replacement or Full Refund Even BEYOND REFUND PERIOD.
  • GOOD FOR GUN RIFLE JEWELRY CAMERA LENS SAFE MOISTURE PROTECTION

 

Free Shipping

 



   Shipping


FAST SHIPPING USING USPS FIRST CLASS MAIL WITHIN 24 HOUR OF PAYMENT 

We ship to all 50 U.S states and APO/FPO addresses. 

No international shipping 

All shipping options include delivery confirmation. 

Only ship to Paypal address (No exception). Please confirm before check out. 
We are always happy to combine shipping. Please request an Invoice before making payment..

*Term of Conditions: Buyer will be responsible for the shipping charge and tax (if applicable). 
   Tax


California Residents add 8.00% sales tax. 
   Return


Defective items will be fully refunded or exchanged with new one. (no shipping or insurance refund) 

If you don't want the item anymore, You have 7 days from receipt to inform us of the return and 5 days to ship it back to us. No restocking fee! (Non Defective items: must be new never used and in original condition)
